availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Mercer County.

Spouse: Lucretia Whittenhill
Children: John R. Whittenhill, Thomas Whittenhill, William E. Whittenhill, James H Whittenhill, Nancy Whittenhill, George Whittenhill

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, page 73.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, Robertson Whittinghill, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=88480799&ref=acom accessed 03/13/2017.
